mention.text: applicants for jobs as police officers
polygraph tests about their character and background
Supreme Court in 1986 that held unconstitutional any involuntary polygraph tests for public employees
binding on trial courts throughout California
an attorney representing the city of Vallejo in its defense of the practice in the case before the court
jobs that have important powers in this society
